Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Carmustine is approved to be used alone or with other drugs to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Hodgkin lymphoma. It is used with other drugs in patients whose disease has not gotten better with other treatment or has recurred (come back).
Multiple myeloma. It is used with prednisone.
Non-Hodgkin lymphoma. It is used with other drugs in patients whose disease has not gotten better with other treatment or has recurred (come back).

Section.Para: Carmustine is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
Carmustine is also available in a different form called carmustine implant. For more information, see the Drug Information Summary for Carmustine Implant.
